Unit Testing Steps for Windows GUI:

1)	Test Single Sequence Secondary Structure Prediction with Heuristic for Suboptimal
	Structure Prediction.
	
	A.	Fold examples/bmorivector.seq with default parameters.  Compare to
		bmorivector_save.ct.
	B.	Fold examples/ec16s.seq using the SHAPE data, 16S.shape.  Compare to 
		ec16s_save.ct
